definitions.meaning: They need to be authorized in order to enter the Vault.
Can freely enter the Vault without authorization and will be protected from the Vault.
Reserved for factions who raid frequently. They are not permitted to enter the Vault at any time. NOT KOS.
They are considered KOS by Vault Security and other Vault officials.

quickRules.title: Jail Time Cap
quickRules.details: Jailtime cap is 15 minutes and must not exceed this unless waiting for Corporate to arrive.

quickRules.title: Detain Tool Use
quickRules.details: Detain tool is for lawful sanctions, HR event support, immobilizing exploiters, or helping glitched players. Abuse is punishable.

quickRules.title: Border Procedure
quickRules.details: Unauthorized players crossing border: warning shot, then lethal action may be taken if they continue.
